content:
Btw, check out https://github.com/zulip/zulip-terminal for a client that doesn't consume much RAM,CPU, with the caveat of not being able to see pictures.
// I can't add any bot that bridges between this stream and a stream at chat.zulip.org because bot creation is disabled here (I made one between czo and Python (python.zulipchat.com) though)
that is neat, but sadly not that usable on a phone
